subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Curry was 0 for 3 from short range on Wednesday, but made up for it with six 3-pointers as the Golden State Warriors took a three-games-to-two lead over the Memphis Grizzlies
snippet: Curry was 0 for 3 from short range on Wednesday, but made up for it with six 3-pointers as the Golden State Warriors took a three-games-to-two lead over the Memphis Grizzlies
